name: Ball Game (itch) (PixelWare Studios)
description:
Ball Game is the first game I made with the new game engine "Godot"

I switched game engine from Unity to Godot because Unity is a giant mess and has a way too steep learning curve for new beginners like me, where Godot has a very big community and an easy learning curve.

I made this game in like 15 minutes, if it gets enough attention I may update it, who knows...
